column1: Little Goat Diner////We got the French toast which included a sunny side up egg inside
column2: sprinkled with syrup and strawberries on top. It was a unique combo
column3: but tasted delicious. We also had the hash browns with cheese. They were kinda burnt but I think this was intentional. Unexpectedly
column4: they were still yummy. Since the portions were pretty large
column5: I shared with one other person and still left stuffed. Other than the food
column6: this place has the typical diner feel because of the seating and decorating. All of the staff is super friendly and warm. Â It also has a ridiculously long wait so be sure to make a reservation for brunch. It gets super packed!
